item.description:
New England-Israel Business Council Networking Reception at ILSI-Biomed - "Israel-US Financing for Israeli Life Science Companies"

Tuesday, May 22 2012
4:30 pm â€“ 6:30 pm

This event was posted by New England Israel Business Council

Type of EventNetworking & Reception

Category N/A (View All)

Committee N/A (View All)

Event Inquiries

KSealine@mintz.com

Location: Tel Aviv, Israel

Join us for an exclusive networking reception in conjunction with ILSI Biomed, the 11th National Life Science & Technology Week in Israel. Presentations will be given by Dr. Nissim Darvish, Senior Managing Director, OrbiMed Advisors and Uri Geiger, Chairman, Accelmed. The reception (sponsored by Mintz Levin and the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center) will take place at the cozy and informal "Gutman Museum of Art", 21 Shimon Rokach Street, Neve Zedek, Tel Aviv (5 minute walk from Biomed venue). Please register by May 20th with Karen Sealine at KSealine@mintz.com or by phone +972-9-7736346.
item.name: Israel-US Financing for Israeli Life Science Companies
